Antharas Watchman Theodric:
And so it is done. Antharas has been stopped and his return prevented.
I have something for you... something that I rarely am allowed to give. The Antharas Slayer Circlet is yours.
What now? I stay, I wait, and I watch. Antharas can never truly be killed. I can only hope that brave warriors such as you come to help and stop Antharas whenever it attempts to return.
